title: Continue button unresponsive on checkout
expected: Clicking the continue button should advance to the next step
actual: Nothing happens when clicking continue; button appears unresponsive
evidence: Now I click the continue button and... nothing happens. Let me try clicking it again. Still nothing. The button doesn't do anything.

title: False zip code validation error
expected: A valid zip code should be accepted by the form
actual: Form displays 'invalid zip code' error for a valid zip code
evidence: I see a small error message at the bottom. It says invalid zip code. But I definitely typed a valid zip code. That's a bug for sure.

title: Order submission hangs indefinitely
expected: Place Order should complete within a few seconds
actual: Spinner runs for 30+ seconds and page appears frozen
evidence: I click Place Order and I get a spinner. It's been spinning for about ten seconds. Okay it's still stuck. The spinner has been going for thirty seconds now.

title: Missing order number on confirmation
expected: Confirmation page should display the order number
actual: Confirmation page loads but the order number is missing
evidence: But the confirmation page is missing the order number. That seems wrong.
